enemies.name: Meat Golem (Summon)
enemies.special: Summoned by Flute of Flesh-Gnawing. Lasts until destroyed or dismissed. Follows commands of summoner.

enemies.name: Goblin
enemies.special: Cowardly, flees when morale breaks. +2 to attacks in groups of 3+

enemies.name: Bandit
enemies.special: Wants treasure more than blood. May negotiate.

enemies.name: Wild Dog
enemies.special: Pack tactics: +1 attack per additional dog (max +3)

enemies.name: Cultist
enemies.special: Fanatic devotion. Will fight to the death for their god.

enemies.name: Zombie
enemies.special: Immune to morale. Slow (acts last in round). Infection on hit (DR12 Toughness or become infected)

enemies.name: Giant Rat
enemies.special: Disease carrier. On bite: DR12 Toughness or contract disease.

enemies.name: Basilisk
enemies.special: Petrifying gaze: DR14 Presence or turn to stone. Averting eyes gives basilisk +2 to attack.

enemies.name: Troll
enemies.special: Regeneration: Regains d6 HP each round unless damaged by fire. Cannot die unless burned.

enemies.name: Wraith
enemies.special: Incorporeal: Immune to normal weapons. Vulnerable to magic, silver, or sacred items. Life drain on hit (lose 1 Toughness permanently)

enemies.name: Plague Beast
enemies.special: Plague Cloud: All within melee range must test DR12 Toughness each round or become infected. Explodes on death (all within 10ft test DR14 or infected)
